original_title: Best of Warner Bros. 50 Cartoon Collection: Looney Tunes
overview: Reunite with Bugs Bunny, Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig, Tweety Bird, Sylvester, Daffy Duck and all the Looney Tunes gang in an animated assortment of hits that have tickled the funny bones of cartoon lovers for generations.
title: Best of Warner Bros. 50 Cartoon Collection: Looney Tunes
